revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=ESR-1220 |revision= |upc=655216003293 |ean= |asin=B000VIDBCU |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/29/2007 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |manuf_model=NSR-1220 |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NI3-SR32106001 |ic_id=3616A-SR321061 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9 |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8186 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160BTC-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-7G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8186 |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model=RTL8225 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Engenius |default_ssid_regex=^Engenius$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:02:6F |default_ch=1 }} "PCB NSR-1220-1.10LFP" and "7016A0015020-1.10" would appear to be silkscreened on the FCC EUT's board.
"PCB NSR-1220-1.20LFP" and "7016A0015020-1.20" is silkscreened on the board in the images below.
The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is an ''unbranded'' AM-121000 / P/N: 7101A0040000 (120VAC ~ 60Hz, 20W -> 12VDC, 1000mA). :ID/OD measurements may not be exact
